subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: After the 2011 U.S. Open, which yielded some low scoring records, the U.S. Golf Association intends to put the tough back into golf's toughest examination.
snippet: After the 2011 U.S. Open, which yielded some low scoring records, the U.S. Golf Association intends to put the tough back into golf's toughest examination.
